GV05garbhupu:1: oṃ pañcātmakaṃ pañcasu vartamānaṃ ṣaḍāśrayaṃ ṣaḍguṇayogayuktam /
GV05garbhupu:2: taṃ saptadhātuṃ trimalaṃ dviyoniṃ caturvidhāhāramayaṃ śarīram // GarUp_1
GV05garbhupu:3: pañcātmakam iti kasmāt pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśam ity asmin pañcātmake śarīre kā pṛthivī kā āpaḥ kiṃ tejaḥ ko vāyuḥ kim ākāśam /
GV05garbhupu:4: tatra pañcātmake śarīre yat kaṭhinaṃ sā pṛthivī yad dravaṃ tā āpaḥ yad uṣṇaṃ tat tejaḥ yat saṃcarati sa vāyuḥ yac chuṣiraṃ tad ākāśam /
GV05garbhupu:5: tatra pṛthivī dhāraṇe āpaḥ piṇḍīkaraṇe tejaḥ prakāśane vāyur vyūhane ākāśam avakāśapradāne /
GV05garbhupu:6: pṛthak śrotre śabdopalabdhau tvak sparśe cakṣuṣī rūpe jihvā rasane nāsikā ghrāṇe upastha ānandane apānam utsarge buddhyā budhyati manasā saṃkalpayati vācā vadati /
GV05garbhupu:9: saptadhātukam iti kasmāt śuklo raktaḥ kṛṣṇo dhūmraḥ pītaḥ kapilaḥ pāṇḍura iti /
GV05garbhupu:11: parasparaṃ saumyaguṇatvāt ṣaḍvidho rasaḥ rasāc choṇitaṃ śoṇitān māṃsaṃ māṃsān medo
GV05garbhupu:12: medasaḥ snāyavaḥ snāyubhyo 'sthīni asthibhyo majjā majjātaḥ śukraṃ śukraśoṇitasaṃyogād
GV05garbhupu:13: āvartate garbho hṛdi vyavasthāṃ nayati hṛdaye 'ntar āgniḥ agnisthāne pittaṃ pittasthāne
GV05garbhupu:14: vāyuḥ vāyuto hṛdayaṃ prājāpatyāt kramāt // GarUp_3
GV05garbhupu:15: ṛtukāle samprayogād ekarātroṣitaṃ kalalaṃ bhavati saptarātroṣitaṃ budbudam ardhamāsābhyantare
GV05garbhupu:16: piṇḍaṃ māsābhyantare kaṭhinaṃ māsadvayena śiraḥ māsatrayeṇa pādapradeśaḥ caturthe
GV05garbhupu:17: gulphajaṭharakaṭipradeśāḥ pañcame pṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ ṣaṣṭhe mukhanāsikākṣiśrotrāṇi saptame
GV05garbhupu:19: pitū reto'tirekāt puruṣaḥ mātū reto'tirekāt strī ubhayor vojatulyatvān napaṃusakaṃ vyākulitamanaso 'ndhāḥ khañcāḥ kubjā vāmanā bhavanti /
GV05garbhupu:20: anyo 'nyavāyuparipīḍitaśukradvaidhyād dvidhā tanū syād yugmāḥ prajāyante /
GV05garbhupu:21: pañcātmakaḥ samarthaḥ pañcātmikā cetasā buddhir gandharasādijñānākṣarākṣaram oṃkāraṃ cintayatīti tad ekākṣaraṃ jñātvāṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ ṣoḍaśa vikārāḥ śarīre tasyaiva dehinaḥ /
GV05garbhupu:23: atha navame māsi sarvalakṣaṇajñānasampūrṇo bhavati pūrvajātiṃ smarati śubhāśubhaṃ ca karma vindati // GarUp_4
GV05garbhupu:25: āhārā vividhā bhuktāḥ pītā nānāvidhāḥ stanāḥ /
GV05garbhupu:26: jātaś caiva mṛtaś caiva janma caiva punaḥ punaḥ // GarUp_5
GV05garbhupu:27: yan mayā parijanasyārthe kṛtaṃ karma śubhāśubham /
GV05garbhupu:28: ekākī tena dahye 'haṃ gatās te phalabhoginaḥ // GarUp_6
GV05garbhupu:29: aho duḥkhodadhau magno na paśyāmi pratikriyām /
GV05garbhupu:30: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat prapadye maheśvaram // GarUp_7
GV05garbhupu:32: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat prapadye nārāyaṇam // GarUp_8
GV05garbhupu:34: yadi yonyāḥ pramucye 'haṃ tat sāṃkhyaṃ yogam abhyase // GarUp_9
GV05garbhupu:36: yadi yonyāḥ pramuñcāmi dhyāye brahma sanātanam // GarUp_10
GV05garbhupu:37: atha yonidvāraṃ samprāpto yantreṇāpīḍyamāno mahatā duḥkhena jātamātras tu vaiṣṇavena vāyunā saṃspṛṣṭas tadā na smarati janma maraṇāni na ca karma śubhāśubhaṃ vindati // GarUp_11
GV05garbhupu:38: śarīram iti kasmāt agnayo hy atra śriyante jñānāgnir darśanāgniḥ koṣṭhāgnir iti tatra koṣṭhāgnir nāmāśitapītalehyacoṣyaṃ pacati /
GV05garbhupu:41: trīṇi sthānāni bhavanti mukhe āhavanīya udare gārhapatyo hṛdi dakṣiṇāgniḥ ātmā yajamāno
GV05garbhupu:42: mano brahmā lobhādayaḥ paśavo dhṛtir dīkṣā saṃtoṣaś ca buddhīndriyāṇi yajñapātrāṇi
GV05garbhupu:43: karmendriyāṇi havīṃṣi śiraḥ kapālaṃ keśā darbhāḥ mukham antarvediḥ catuṣkapālaṃ śiraḥ
GV05garbhupu:44: ṣoḍaśa pārśvadantapaṭalāni saptottaraṃ marmaśataṃ sāśītikaṃ saṃdhiśataṃ sanavakaṃ
GV05garbhupu:45: snāyuśataṃ sapta sirāśatāni pañca majjāśatāni asthīni ca ha vai trīṇi śatāni ṣaṣṭiḥ
GV05garbhupu:46: sārdhacatasro romāṇi koṭyo hṛdayaṃ palāny aṣṭau dvādaśa palā jihvā pittaprasthaṃ
GV05garbhupu:47: kaphasyāḍhakaṃ śukrakuḍavaṃ medaḥ prasthau dvāv aniyataṃ mūtrapurīṣam āhāraparimāṇāt /
GV05garbhupu:48: paippalādaṃ mokṣaśāstraṃ paippalādaṃ mokṣaśāstram iti // GarUp_12
